languages.text: "Весь дворец сочится страхом... Дракон обвил его своим телом и переломал кости. Что было истиной... сегодня обернется ложью".
"The entire palace is drenched with fear... The dragon has encircled it with its body and crushed its bones. What was true... today has become a lie."
languages.original_text: "Весь дворец сочится страхом... Дракон обвил его своим телом и переломал кости. Что было истиной... сегодня обернется ложью".

traits.locale_text: "The entire palace is drenched with fear... The dragon has encircled it with its body and crushed its bones. What was true... today has become a lie."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The entire palace is drenched with fear... The dragon has encircled it with its body and crushed its bones. What was true... today has become a lie."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “整座皇宫都浸染在恐惧之中……巨龙的躯体缠住了它，碾碎了它的每根骨头。原本真实的事情……如今却成为了谎言。”
languages.original_text: "The entire palace is drenched with fear... The dragon has encircled it with its body and crushed its bones. What was true... today has become a lie."

traits.locale_text: “整座皇宫都浸染在恐惧之中……巨龙的躯体缠住了它，碾碎了它的每根骨头。原本真实的事情……如今却成为了谎言。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Este palacio está completamente empapado de terror... El dragón lo ha rodeado con su cuerpo y ha aplastado sus huesos. Lo que antes era cierto... hoy es mentira».
languages.original_text: "The entire palace is drenched with fear... The dragon has encircled it with its body and crushed its bones. What was true... today has become a lie."

traits.locale_text: «Este palacio está completamente empapado de terror... El dragón lo ha rodeado con su cuerpo y ha aplastado sus huesos. Lo que antes era cierto... hoy es mentira».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「宮殿全体が恐怖に包まれている… ドラゴンがその体で包囲し、骨を砕いている。これまで真実であったものが…今日、嘘となった」
languages.original_text: "The entire palace is drenched with fear... The dragon has encircled it with its body and crushed its bones. What was true... today has become a lie."

traits.locale_text: 「宮殿全体が恐怖に包まれている… ドラゴンがその体で包囲し、骨を砕いている。これまで真実であったものが…今日、嘘となった」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Der gesamte Palast zittert vor Angst ... Der Drache hat ihn mit seinem Leib umfasst und zermalmt seine Kochen. Was einst wahr war ... wurde heute zur Lüge."
languages.original_text: "The entire palace is drenched with fear... The dragon has encircled it with its body and crushed its bones. What was true... today has become a lie."

traits.locale_text: "Der gesamte Palast zittert vor Angst ... Der Drache hat ihn mit seinem Leib umfasst und zermalmt seine Kochen. Was einst wahr war ... wurde heute zur Lüge."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « La peur règne ici. Le dragon s'est enroulé autour de cet endroit avant de lui briser les os. Ce qui était autrefois vrai... n'est plus qu'un mensonge. »
languages.original_text: "The entire palace is drenched with fear... The dragon has encircled it with its body and crushed its bones. What was true... today has become a lie."

traits.locale_text: « La peur règne ici. Le dragon s'est enroulé autour de cet endroit avant de lui briser les os. Ce qui était autrefois vrai... n'est plus qu'un mensonge. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Tüm bu yer korkuyla yıkanmış... Ejderha onu bedeniyle çevrelemiş ve kemiklerini kırmış. Gerçek olan... Bugün yalan olmuş."
languages.original_text: "The entire palace is drenched with fear... The dragon has encircled it with its body and crushed its bones. What was true... today has become a lie."
